name: FSliderStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SSlider

NormalBarImage: Image to use when the slider bar is in its normal state
HoveredBarImage: Image to use when the slider bar is in its hovered state
DisabledBarImage: Image to use when the slider bar is in its disabled state
NormalThumbImage: Image to use when the slider thumb is in its normal state
HoveredThumbImage: Image to use when the slider thumb is in its hovered state
DisabledThumbImage: Image to use when the slider thumb is in its disabled state
